mainHero.title: Coming To Vineland
mainHero.subtitle: NJ this spring.
mainHero.description: Xpress Smoke Shop is your one-stop shop for all cigar, vape, and smoking accessories.

experience.title: A Brand New Smoke & Vape Shop Experience

items.title: Raising The Bar
items.description: Here at our flagship store we will have the best cigars, vapes, and all smoke related accessories. Come check out our walk-in humidor room or gigantic hookah wall!

products.title: Latest & greatest
products.subtitle: All the best vapes, glass, and accessories!
products.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

items.name: Vapes
items.description: We carry a large but currated collection of the smoothiest and tastiest disposable and refillable vapes.

items.name: Cigars
items.description: In our oversized walk-in humidor we carry a vast selection of cigars from all over the world.

items.name: Cannabis Accessories
items.description: We have everything you need from smoking devices like glass pipes, bowls, herb vapirizers, and rolling papers to stash cans and grinders.

items.name: Hookahs
items.description: On our massive hookah wall we have a large variety of hookah models and some of the best shisha around.
